meeting_info.organization: Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development
Thor Erickson, Assistant Director, Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the Meeting Record
agenda_items.description: Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the December 11, 2023 Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Discussion on Housing Policy Implementation
agenda_items.description: Review and general discussion regarding implementation by the City’s Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department of the City’s new Housing Policy (DHP33), including Equity Strategy Target Areas.
agenda_items.presenter: Thor Erickson, Assistant Director, Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department
